016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jmxconnector;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.Secrets;
020import jakarta.inject.Inject;
021import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
022import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PreDestroy;
023import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
024import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
025
026import javax.management.MBeanServer;
027import javax.management.remote.JMXConnectorServer;
028import javax.management.remote.JMXConnectorServerFactory;
029import javax.management.remote.JMXServiceURL;
030import javax.management.remote.rmi.RMIConnectorServer;
031import javax.rmi.ssl.SslRMIClientSocketFactory;
032import javax.rmi.ssl.SslRMIServerSocketFactory;
033import java.io.IOException;
034import java.lang.management.ManagementFactory;
035import java.rmi.RemoteException;
036import java.rmi.registry.LocateRegistry;
037import java.rmi.registry.Registry;
038import java.util.Map;
039
040/**
041 * JMX RMI Connector manager
042 *
043 * @author rickardoberg
044 * @since 13/04/2022
045 */
046
047@Service(name = "jmxconnector")
048@RunLevel(6)
049public class JmxRmiConnectorService
050        implements PreDestroy {
051
052    private final JMXConnectorServer jmxConnectorServer;
053    private final Logger logger;
054
055    @Inject
056    public JmxRmiConnectorService(Configuration configuration, Secrets secrets, Logger logger) throws IOException {
057        this.logger = logger;
058
059        JmxConnectorConfiguration jmxConnectorConfiguration = new JmxConnectorConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("jmxconnector"));
060
061        if (jmxConnectorConfiguration.isSslEnabled())
062        {
063            // TODO This needs to be hooked up with keystores
064            SslRMIClientSocketFactory csf = new SslRMIClientSocketFactory();
065            SslRMIServerSocketFactory ssf = new SslRMIServerSocketFactory();
066            Registry registry;
067            try {
068                registry = LocateRegistry.createRegistry(jmxConnectorConfiguration.getRegistryPort(), csf, ssf);
069            } catch (RemoteException e) {
070                registry = LocateRegistry.getRegistry(jmxConnectorConfiguration.getRegistryPort());
071            }
072
073            MBeanServer mbs = ManagementFactory.getPlatformMBeanServer();
074            JMXServiceURL url = new JMXServiceURL(jmxConnectorConfiguration.getURI());
075
076            Map<String, ?> environment = Map.of(JMXConnectorServer.AUTHENTICATOR, new ConfigJmxAuthenticator(jmxConnectorConfiguration.getUsers(), secrets),
077                    RMIConnectorServer.RMI_CLIENT_SOCKET_FACTORY_ATTRIBUTE, csf,
078                    RMIConnectorServer.RMI_SERVER_SOCKET_FACTORY_ATTRIBUTE, ssf,
079                    "com.sun.jndi.rmi.factory.socket", csf);
080            jmxConnectorServer = JMXConnectorServerFactory.newJMXConnectorServer(url, environment, mbs);
081            jmxConnectorServer.start();
082        } else
083        {
084            Registry registry;
085            try {
086                registry = LocateRegistry.createRegistry(jmxConnectorConfiguration.getRegistryPort());
087            } catch (RemoteException e) {
088                registry = LocateRegistry.getRegistry(jmxConnectorConfiguration.getRegistryPort());
089            }
090
091            MBeanServer mbs = ManagementFactory.getPlatformMBeanServer();
092            JMXServiceURL url = new JMXServiceURL(jmxConnectorConfiguration.getURI());
093
094            Map<String, ?> environment = Map.of(JMXConnectorServer.AUTHENTICATOR, new ConfigJmxAuthenticator(jmxConnectorConfiguration.getUsers(), secrets));
095            jmxConnectorServer = JMXConnectorServerFactory.newJMXConnectorServer(url, environment, mbs);
096            jmxConnectorServer.start();
097        }
098        logger.info("JMX connector available at: {}", jmxConnectorConfiguration.getExternalURI());
099    }
100
101    @Override
102    public void preDestroy() {
103        try {
104            jmxConnectorServer.stop();
105        } catch (IOException e) {
106            logger.warn("Could not stop JMX connector", e);
107        }
108    }
109}
